snippet: United States markets were volatile after forecast-beating jobs figures were released. The dollar jumped, and bank stocks rose.
abstract: Stocks are mixed due to robust October jobs report and prospect of higher interest rates.
lead_paragraph: United States markets were volatile after forecast-beating jobs figures were released. The dollar jumped, and bank stocks rose.

headline.main: Wall St. Drifts After a Strong Jobs Report
headline.print_headline: Investors Rearrange Their Holdings as Interest Rate Increase Looks More Likely
